translations: n.论文；学位论文（dissertation 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: It should be noted that dissertations submitted late will not be accepted.
sentences.translation: 应该注意的是迟交的论文将不予接受。

sentences.sentence: Reference is an important part of dissertations.
sentences.translation: 参考文献是学术论文的重要组成部分。

sentences.sentence: Most of the nervous students began intently scribbling out long dissertations.
sentences.translation: 大多数学生很紧张，都开始专心地写他们的论文。
